code: import{motion}from'motion/react';/* Captilize first letter of the string */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function capFirst(val){return String(val).charAt(0).toUpperCase()+String(val).slice(1);}const sideBarBtnStyle={color:'lightgray',width:'80px',height:'80px',backgroundColor:'transparent',border:'none'};const sidebarStyle={backgroundColor:'black',backgroundClip:'content-box',paddingTop:'25vh',zIndex:'2',position:'fixed',display:'flex'};const sideBarBtnDivStyle={display:'flex',color:'gray',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'};function Sidebar(_ref){let{pages}=_ref;function scrollToSection(page){document.getElementById(page).scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}const sideBarStyle={backgroundClip:'content-box',backgroundColor:'lightgray',width:'3px',borderRadius:'40px',boxShadow:'0px 0px 10px white'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-div",style:sidebarStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"side-bar-btn-div",style:sideBarBtnDivStyle,children:pages.map(page=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"side-bar-btn",style:sideBarBtnStyle,onClick:()=>scrollToSection(page),children:capFirst(page)}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:sideBarStyle})]});}function AnimatedSidebar(_ref2){let{pages}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{style:{position:'fixed'},initial:{x:-100},animate:{x:0},transition:{duration:0.4,ease:'easeInOut',delay:0.3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{pages:pages})});}export{AnimatedSidebar,capFirst};
